full_summary:
**RFP Heating and Plumbing Upgrade, Various Buildings, Springhill Institution**
=====================================================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS4265611070-Doc4267216648
**AMendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** October 20, 2023

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Heating and Plumbing Upgrade project at the Springhill Institution in Springhill, Nova Scotia.

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The project aims to prepare a feasibility report for the replacement of heating, domestic water, and sanitary piping in 12 of the original buildings at the Springhill Institution.

**Eligible Firms**
-----------------

This RFP is issued against Supply Arrangement (SA) E0225-150564 – Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Services. The eligible firms, qualified under the Mechanical discipline for the province of Nova Scotia, are:

*   Stantec Consulting Ltd.
*   CBCL Limited
*   M&R Engineering Limited

**Procurement Details**
-------------------

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
*   **Procurement Category:** Service Related (SRV)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Refer to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

**Contracting Entity Information**
--------------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Contact Information:**
    *   Name: Carlos Castillo Nieto
    *   Email: carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
